revised_title: Decentralized Optimization and Hierarchical Control in Complex Systems
tldr: This article discusses the use of operational research and systems analysis in decision-making for complex systems. It argues that complex systems can be structured as interconnected assemblies of subsystems, and by exploiting this structure, it is possible to decompose the problem of controlling a complex system into manageable subproblems. The article explores decentralized optimization and hierarchical control methods, emphasizing their importance in managing complex industrial systems.
